# define format
```{r}
format.A <-  theme_classic()+ theme(plot.title = element_text(size= 11, hjust=0.5, face="bold"))+ 
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 10)) + theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 10, face="bold")) +
```

```{r}
d1$Groups
```

# Clarify the factors
```{r}
d1$Groups = factor(d1$Groups,order = TRUE, levels = c("VC", "API-2", "Cortisol","Cortisol+API-2"))
```

# Summarize the d1
```{r}
d1_summary <- d1 %>%
  group_by(Groups) %>%
  summarise(
    Mean = mean(Relative_cell_proliferation),
    SD = sd(Relative_cell_proliferation) # This avoids a grouped df warning in ggplot
  )

d1_summary$Relative_cell_proliferation <- d1_summary$Mean
head(d1_summary)
##View(d1_summary)

```

```{r}

p1 <- ggplot(d1, aes(x = Groups, y = Relative_cell_proliferation, fill = Groups)) +
  geom_bar(data = d1_summary, aes(y = Relative_cell_proliferation), stat = "identity", position = position_dodge(),color="black") +
  geom_point(position = position_jitterdodge(jitter.width = 0.2, dodge.width = 0.9), aes(color = Groups), 
             shape = 21, size = 3, stroke = 0.5, fill = "white")  + 
  geom_errorbar(data = d1_summary, aes(ymin = Relative_cell_proliferation - SD, ymax = Relative_cell_proliferation + SD), 
                width = .2, position = position_dodge(0.9)) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c( "#666666","#666666", "#666666","#666666")) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c( "black" ,"black", "black" ,"black")) + ylim(0,2) + 
  format.A + labs(x="Androgens (10 nM)", y="Relative cell proliferation")

print(p1)

ggsave("C:/UIUC documents/Androgen manuscript/Data and codes/Figures/Cortisol_LNCaP_API-2_coculture.pdf", height = 3.5, width = 2)

```
